item.title: Slides
item.description: Userful tools and concepts https://epogrebnyak.github.io/slides/tools/ Command line [ ] Linux file system streams and pipes [ ] Windows WSL MINGW набор утилит [ ] Remote machine Google Colab Termux (Android) AWS EC2 Digital Ocean Яндекс, Mail Test-driven development (TDD) [ ] Unit test, end-to-end tests and dirty hybrids UnitTest pytest [ ] Continious integration Travis CI Circle CI [ ] Test coverage
